Literature.Title: Peptides Containing the PCNA Interacting Motif APIM Bind to the Beta-Clamp and Inhibit Bacterial Growth and Mutagenesis.
Literature.Author: Nedal A, Raeder SB, Dalhus B, Helgesen E, Forstrom RJ, Lindland K, Sumabe BK, Martinsen JH, Kragelund BB, Skarstad K, Bjoras M, Otterlei M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus aureus FDA486(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus aureus FusA88700(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=3µM),Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=5µM),Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=11µM)
